room_title: Escape room "Prison Break - Walk the Mile" by Odyssey Escape Game in Chicago
review: Odyssey is a super fun place to do escape rooms! We just did the prison break room, and it was an absolute blast! All the clues were challenging enough and they made enough sense; hence, this place is fun for all ages! It was very cool, engaging, and enjoyable. We will certainly be back, and I cannot wait to break out of the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break - Walk the Mile" by Odyssey Escape Game in Chicago
review: This is a great place to spend a afternoon with your friends doing something really fun and interesting. The different rooms are fantastic

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break - Walk the Mile" by Odyssey Escape Game in Chicago
review: We had so much fun breaking out of prison. The staff were really great. Clues were good. Highly recommend. Nice facility.
